item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 27, 2024 at 8:40 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Fed’s preferred inflation metric rose to 2.7% in March
2. Military briefing: Russia’s narrowing advantage in Ukraine
3. Ban on non-compete agreements sends shockwave across Wall Street
4. Anglo American set to be bought or broken up after rejecting £31bn BHP offer, investors believe
5. Thoma Bravo to buy UK-listed Darktrace for £4.3bn
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 27, 2024 at 8:40 AM UTC
